sections.paragraph: + A descendant of the royal family of Judah. (1 Chronicles 3:20) + A man mentioned as the father of Meshullam, who assisted in rebuilding the walls of Jerusalem. (Nehemiah 3:4,30; 6:18) + A Levite. (1 Chronicles 9:16) + A doorkeeper for the ark. (1 Chronicles 15:23) + One of the tribe of Ephraim in the time of Ahaz. (2 Chronicles 28:12) + Father of Asaph the singer. (1 Chronicles 15:17) [[285]Berachiah] + Father of Zechariah. (Zechariah 1:1,7)
